settings.text: We are pleased to present the latest collaboration between Overkill and adidas! Just in time for the European Football Championship, we're releasing the adidas ZX 8000, which we've affectionately nicknamed the "Home Game". One of the biggest sporting events in 2024 is already casting its shadow ahead and the fact that it's a European Championship in our own country makes it all the more exciting for us! The final will be held in Berlin's Olympic Stadium, the place that inspired the design and where we produced our content. And of course, we hope that the German national football team will make it to the final.

We have already proven more than once that Overkill and adidas ZX simply go well together. Shortly after the launch of the Overkill x adidas ZX 6000 from the Anniversary Pack, the next ZX will follow immediately. The ZX 8000 will be available exclusively at Overkill.

The design of the shoe picks up on the colors of the German national team - black, red, and yellow - and thus celebrates Germany's football culture and history. This makes the shoe the perfect companion for getting in the mood for the European Championships and cheering on the national team.

In addition to the color scheme, other design elements are also inspired by football. Particularly noteworthy are the insoles, which feature a colorful print inspired by the iconic Olympic Stadium in Berlin. This detail emphasizes the connection to the European Football Championships and gives the sneaker a special touch. The Overkill branding on the heel and tongue label rounds off the design and gives the trainers a unique look.

The adidas ZX 8000 Overkill is a must-have for sneaker enthusiasts and football fans alike and will undoubtedly be a coveted collector's item. Visit us at the Overkill Store in Berlin or Cologne on 08 June to get your exclusive pair. Furthermore, there will be a raffle for the Overkill x adidas ZX 8000 "Heimspiel" starting on the 6th of June.

Overkill x adidas ZX 8000 Overkill
